relevant_findings.general: Alert and in no apparent distress, walking in hallway with walker, stopped every few minutes to catch his breath
relevant_findings.ears_nose_throat: Ears and nose without visible erythema, masses, or trauma. Oropharynx without visible lesion, erythema or exudate
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Heart regular, no murmur, no S3, no S4
relevant_findings.respiratory: Lungs clear to auscultation, moderate air movement. No wheezes or rhonchi. Trace crackles at bases
relevant_findings.gastrointestinal: Abdomen soft, non-distended, tender to palpation in lower quadrants bilaterally. Healing wound in abdomen with gauze inside, surrounding well-granulated tissue with no pus or bleeding
relevant_findings.genitourinary: No suprapubic fullness or tenderness to palpation. Mild tenderness in lower back bilaterally, but no CVA tenderness
relevant_findings.musculoskeletal: Neck supple, moves all extremities, strength grossly full and symmetric bilaterally in all limbs
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert, oriented, face symmetric, gaze conjugate with EOMI, speech fluent, moves all limbs
relevant_findings.extremities: Chronic discoloration of lower extremities, tense, tender, 1+ edema
